mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Frost, Daniel to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Frost, Daniel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 11 1863. By Telegraph from Parkersburg 11 1863. The gunboat Bellson has guns aboard which can be replaced in Cincinnati If you can get permission to have two of them left here I can with the assistance of the crew of the Narum Keag put them in position to protect the town I have no artillery. D Frost Col [...]pd [page 2] Gen Barry C[...] you take any ste[...] to have those guns col[...] Frost speaks of retained at Parkersburg I think it important F.H. Peirpoint
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Frost, Daniel
Parkersburg, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
